message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand that $180 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $160. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really love the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $160 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product. Can you consider that price?
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob! I can offer it to you for $155. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really get a lot of value out of this product.
